## ANU Biometrics Seminar Series

The series is designed to foster knowledge exchange in the intersection of biology, statistics, and data science. We hope to use this as a regular platform for the ANU community to share their work, spark meaningful discussions and cultivate interdisciplinary collaborations.

If you would like to receive notice about the seminar, please complete the short form [here](https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=XHJ941yrJEaa5fBTPkhkN8f_OhednjZDplTOe4g095JUMVdBV1JDRTVBMU9NNzZKNVY0STFaUkVWSSQlQCN0PWcu).
